messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 0 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 25 Credits.

That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security level elevated.

The station has received reliable information about possible hostile activity on the station. Security staff may have weapons visible, random searches are permitted. A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 0 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 50 Credits.

Market Reset! MODular Solutions has been rolled into a larger company, resetting the price of iron.
Market Reset! SolGov was purchased by a private investment firm, resetting the price of uranium.
Lockdown! Australicus Industrial Mining , in a stunning move, has been embargoed by TerraGov, resulting in a halt of trade of glass.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 0 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 75 Credits.

Large Boost! Australicus Industrial Mining discovered a new valuable use for bluespace crystal.
Large Drop! Dreamland Robotics has been hit with a major lawsuit, resulting in a price drop for titanium.
Market Reset! Australicus Industrial Mining was purchased by a private investment firm, resetting the price of bluespace crystal.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 0 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 100 Credits.

Market Reset! Dreamland Robotics was purchased by a private investment firm, resetting the price of iron.
Market Reset! SolGov was purchased by a private investment firm, resetting the price of uranium.
Market Reset! Nakamura Engineering has been rolled into a larger company, resetting the price of iron.
Lockdown! SolGov is being investigated by the Galactic Trade Commission, resulting in a halt of trade for gold.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 0 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 125 Credits.

Large Boost! Dreamland Robotics has produced a report that raised the price of bluespace crystal.
Market Reset! Australicus Industrial Mining restructured, resetting the price of titanium.
Lockdown! Aussec Armory is being investigated by the Galactic Trade Commission, resulting in a halt of trade for uranium.
Selling like Hotcakes! Robust Industries, LLC , in a surprise move, monopolized supply and has raised the price of diamond.
Market Reset! SolGov has been rolled into a larger company, resetting the price of titanium.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 0 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 150 Credits.

Market Reset! Dreamland Robotics restructured, resetting the price of diamond.
Selling like Hotcakes! Aussec Armory is hitting it big! Dramatically stocking and raising the price of uranium.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 50 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 300 Credits.

Large Drop! Nakamura Engineering has produced a report that lowered the price of titanium.
Lockdown! Australicus Industrial Mining is being investigated by the Galactic Trade Commission, resulting in a halt of trade for iron.
Lockdown! SolGov is being investigated by the Galactic Trade Commission, resulting in a halt of trade for silver.
Large Boost! Aussec Armory has just released a new product that raised the price of diamond.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Nanotrasen Stock Report
messages.body:
Thank you for reading the Nanotrasen Stock Report. Due to quarterly earnings reports exceeding expectations by several percent, the Nanotrasen Incorporated stock has jumped 5%, one of the largest in months.

Originally published on: 9/26/2562
